Articles.Content: 2) An ominous yet beautiful mushroom cloud hung over the devastated landscape, heralding a new age of terror for the grieving families of all the innocent workers who perished in the inferno.
3: Turned out that their world was save filed before it happened. They reloaded successfully and all was well. They always have a noncorruptable save file to fall back on, no matter what.
2: Jeb, Bill, Bob, and Valentina were on the Mün when the KSC was attacked.
1) Kiebherr brought the wrong crane while constructing a new VAB
2) It was too large

3) The decided to turn the VAB into a megabay

Edited November 10, 2022 by Rutabaga22
4: But somehow it got sold on Ebay.
1) The team decided it was time to design an EVE SSTO to rescue Kurt Kerman, who had been languishing on the lonely planet for decades.
2: They built their design, called it Adam and launched it towards the lonely planet.

3 But some Kerbal Terrorists put a  bunch of Kapple(A kerban high explosive fruit that is equal to 500 t C4)in the fuel tank and it exploded. 

Edited November 10, 2022 by Abel Military Services

4: Thanks to that massive boost in performance the rocket got to the Lonely Planet in record time. It jettisoned that section and sent a lander that successfully recovered Kurt Kerman. They then started the slower trip home using their Ion engines.

1 EMERGENCY MESSAGE: THE OMEGA WARHEAD HAS BEEN ACTIVATED DUE TO THE CONTAINMENT BREACH. PLEASE EVACUATE IMMEDIATELY. T - 3: 00

Edited November 12, 2022 by Abel Military Services

2) The crew of the NSEA-Protector ran around in blind panic. "What does the Omega 13 device do?" asked Commander Taggart over his communicator. "Most think that it's a bomb capable of destroying the entire universe in thirteen seconds, but I and others believe that it is a matter rearranger, which effectively makes you travel thirteen seconds into the past", squeaked the geeky teenager he was speaking to.

(Actually the omega warhead is a 8 million ton Thermonuclear warhead)

3 Then they hear a big explosion sound. That's the last thing they feel. The site is destroyed, along with the escaping creatures.

Spoiler

The Omega 13 Device
1: A kerbal Oceanographer finds some interesting ruins deep below the surface.
2) The artifacts made a map to endless snacks.
The snacks are packed and sent to the K.S.S Wernher Von Braun
4: Sadly they are very stale and nobody will eat them.
1 Somebody dropped an anti-fusion bomb on Laythe and the whole jool system got blown up.
2) The Kerbal Science Institute attempted to get Kopernucus installed and modding in an identical system.
3 same thing happened again on Kerbin
4) Now kerbalkind is extinct.
The first Mun landing went perfectly, then Buzz Kerman, while admiring the view from the porthole, noticed something moving.
2: Well he saw the thing, coming out of a crater, it had tentacles, and a beak for later. He gave a gasp, said "Neil can you see?" "It looks like a Purple Kerbal eater, to me."
